mapper.select: select b.board_no, title, content, views, write_date, refer, depth, step, b.all_board_list_no, b.id, NICKNAME, team_no, file_name, (select count(*) from board_comment where board_no=b.board_no) as comment_count from ( SELECT * FROM board_list ) b inner join `user` u on u.id = b.id inner join all_board_list a on a.all_board_list_no = b.all_board_list_no left outer join board_file f on f.board_no = b.board_no where a.all_board_list_no = #{allBoardListNo} ORDER BY refer DESC, step asc

select b.board_no, b.title, b.content, b.views, b.write_date, b.comment_count, b.all_board_list_no, b.id, a.name, u.nickname,b.refer from board_list b inner join `user` u on b.id = u.id inner join all_board_list a on b.all_board_list_no = a.all_board_list_no where board_no=#{boardNo}
mapper.update: update board_list set step=step+1 where refer=#{refer} and step > #{step}
mapper.insert: insert into board_file(origin_file_name, file_name, file_size, all_board_list_no, board_no) values(#{originFileName}, #{fileName}, #{fileSize}, #{allBoardListNo}, #{boardNo})
